price: 17. Sidaa awgeed cidhibtooda waa inay ahaan Naarta gudaheed, iyagoo ku dhex waaraya weligood. Waana sidaas abaal marinta daalimiinta (gar ma qaatayaasha).
arabic: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fakāna ʿāqibatahumā annahumā fī al-nāri khālidayni fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
